name: Lemon Fantasy
description:
Become a true Lemon Wizard!

Lemon Fantasy is a classic, turn-based JRPG with fighting game elements. Explore the Citric Islands. Enter mysterious dungeons, challenge dangerous foes, make donations to gnomes and find the mystical lemons.

The game is controlled with a Keyboard.

Overworld

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • X - Interact

Combat

  • Z - Cast
  • X - Act
  • C - Items
  • V - Flee
Making Of

Lemon Fantasy was designed and written by J. Monroy as the final project for CS50.

Instructions image made by @Nanyopolis.
